data.title: A BLAST FROM THE PAST: Bill Duke starred as a pimp named "Sylk" in the 1976 episode of "Kojak" called "Bad Dude". Kojak was a popular TV...
data.meta_description:
276 likes, 21 comments - realbillduke on March 7, 2022: "A BLAST FROM THE PAST: Bill Duke starred as a pimp named "Sylk" in the 1976 episode of "Kojak" called "Bad Dude".

Kojak was a popular TV series in the 70s starring #TellySavalas. Kojak was known for sucking on his lollipop. 

This was an early glimpse of Bill's wide-ranging talent as an actor. He can go from playing a pimp, to a worker at a Car Wash, a detective, then a mercenary and everything in between. When you have true talent, there are no boundaries, and Bill Duke has shown us his abundance of talent for over four decades.

Much respect to this phenomenal actor, writer and director...Mr. Bill Duke.

 #realbillduke #The1970s #DukeMediaFoundation #YouniteNetwork #dukemediaentertainment #HeidiBFuller @sydthewriter #carlgilliard #williammichaelbarbee #HaywoodGalbreath #ShebaAbrahaim #Kojak #tv #film #director #writer #legend".
